content: danish version available here 1 ________________________ simple slipped stitches make the geometric colour play a breeze to do whether you re still in the september-to-spring rhythm of school or just remember the thrill of newness every autumn brought the study hall shawl is meant to evoke those tidy stacks of books and supplies with geometric precision it punches up your autumn wardrobe with that effortlessly cool look we all want to keep us warm **skills used ** knit and purl slipping sts chart reading m1l m1r garter tab cast on **yarn ** one twisted tree prime colour 1 jane eyre 1 skein colour 2 take the black 1 skein -pattern written with 10% yarn buffer **finished measurements ** length at center back 27 inches/68 5cm width 66 inches/167 5cm this pattern has been tech edited and test knit 1 https //strikkeglad dk/18628/paa-laesesalen/
